name: places/ChIJFy_VZBz0wokRYHgVfB7T1pc
formattedAddress: 1547 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1547 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: This is a small but a very beautiful church. I attended a baptism of a child there recently and the service and ceremony were exceptional. The church has an event hall in the basement. I loved being there, it was very peaceful.

text.text: This is a small but a very beautiful church. I attended a baptism of a child there recently and the service and ceremony were exceptional. The church has an event hall in the basement. I loved being there, it was very peaceful.

originalText.text:
I’ve never been to the church we made arrangements for a funeral with the priest everything was agreed-upon and at the last moment he called and canceled the funeral never thought something like that would ever happen not to us but to anyone. The man is afraid of getting Covid therefore in order to hold a funeral there the coffin will be placed In the foyer of the church entrance the grieving family as well as any guests that come to pay respects would have to wait outside while the  service is being conducted. We were forced at the last minute to change church.
As a traditional Greek family we had to have all the flowers redirected to a new church, contact all who wanted to attend the funeral of another church. We had put it in the paper with all the information as to when and where The funeral will be held. When we tried to call the newspaper it was too late to have everything changed. So definitely I would not recommend a church that is unable to accommodate people in their parish. We should all practice social distancing we should all take care of one another or health and well-being. I have spoken to many priests I have seen many people at churches and gatherings at the churches an old priest try to keep people from the congregations safe. A priest must believe in good not only evil and unfortunately this particular church the priest only believes in evil.

originalText.text: Father Ierotheos and church staff are very traditional great people. A Greek Orthodox Christian Church surrounded by the ghetto but when services are rendered you know there is nothing to worry about. Special events like Christmas and Easter and other services are rendered there. Miss going there to pray. Hopefully soon I could visit them again.

originalText.text: For the last 33 years, you feel the presence of God when you enter this Church. The surprise, in the middle of Spanish Harlem.....I have never felt threaten in any way.

text.text: For the last 33 years, you feel the presence of God when you enter this Church. The surprise, in the middle of Spanish Harlem.....I have never felt threaten in any way.

originalText.text:
My favorite church to go and be with my family...
You feel at peace here .
A must visit !
